headline: Project Cybersafe Schools: Bringing security tools for free to small K-12 school districts in the US
keywords: Education, Email, Cloudflare Area 1, DNS Filtering, USA
description: Announced as part of the Back to School Safely: K-12 Cybersecurity Summit at the White House on August 7, Project Cybersafe Schools will support eligible K-12 public school districts with a package of Zero Trust cybersecurity solutions â€” for free, and with no time limit
